tool_description: Retrive ICD-10 (https://icd.who.int/browse10/2019/en) code for diseases or health conditions.
title: International Disease Classification - 10th edition - ICD10

api_list.name: ICD-10 in Italian
api_list.description: Retrieve codification on **CID-10** for a specific disease or condition in Italian.

api_list.name: ICD-10 in English
api_list.description: Return a Json describing a list of diseases and their ICD-10 code according to the search terms.

api_list.name: CID-10 in Portuguese
api_list.description: Retrieve codification on **CID-10** for a specific disease or condition in Portuguese.
